history.question: What were you doing with the antique marble bust in the library at 7pm last night?
history.feedback: I was not in the library at 7pm; I had just arrived at the manor and was setting up for the weekend retreat.

history.question: At 7pm last night, were you in the library alone or with anyone else?
history.feedback: I was alone, just enjoying some peace after dinner.

history.question: What were you doing in the library between 6pm and 8pm last night?
history.feedback: I was studying for my history exam in the library, but I'm not sure why that would be relevant.

history.question: Were you in the library at 7pm last night?
history.feedback: No, I was just arriving, the library seemed so... imposing.

history.question: Did you bring the antique marble bust into the library around 7pm last night?
history.feedback: No, I arrived at the manor at 7:00 PM and only entered the library later to examine the appraisal notes and the antique marble bust around 9:15 PM.

history.question: Did you have any disagreements with Dr. Eleanor Blackwood before this incident?
history.feedback: No, I did not have any disagreements with Dr. Blackwood. She was always professional and respectful during our interactions.
